parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Detection

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns sorted array of targets, '''known''' to the enquirer (including own troops), where the accuracy coefficient reflects how close the result matches the query. This command could be CPU intensive.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> enquirer '''targetsQuery''' [targetIgnore, targetSide, targetType, targetPosition, targetMaxAge]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> enquirer: [[Object]] - For whom the query will be made

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value>  [targetIgnore, targetSide, targetType, targetPosition, targetMaxAge]: [[Array]] - Query

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> targetIgnore: [[Object]] - Target object to exclude from results. [[objNull]] - return every target
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> targetSide: [[Side]] - Desired side of the target. [[sideUnknown]] - any side
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> targetType: [[String]] - Desired target [[typeOf]]. "" - any type
</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value> targetPosition: [[Array]] - Desired target position in format of [[Position2D]] or [[Position3D]] (only [x,y] is considered). Position tolerance is 200m from the actual position of the target. [] - any position
</value></part><part><name>p7</name>=<value> targetMaxAge: [[Number]] - Desired max age of the target. This will limit returned results to the targets younger than specified age. 0 - any age

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - '''sorted''' array of returned targets in the following format: 
<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[accuracy, target, targetSide, targetType, targetPosition, targetAge],...] where:
* accuracy: [[Number]] - a coefficient, which reflects how close the returned result to the query filter. Range: 0 - 1 (1 - best match)
* target: [[Object]] - the actual target object
* targetSide: [[Side]] - side of the target
* targetType: [[String]] - target [[typeOf]]
* targetPosition: [[Array]] - [x,y] of the target 
* targetAge: [[Number]] - the actual target age in seconds (can be negative)

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> Return all known targets for player:<code>_targets = [[player]] [[targetsQuery]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[objNull]], [[sideUnknown]], "", [], 0];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Prioritise all known OPFOR targets and return targets less than 10 seconds old:<code>_targets = [[player]] [[targetsQuery]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[objNull]], [[east]], "", [], 10];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[targetsAggregate]], [[targetKnowledge]], [[knowsAbout]], [[forgetTarget]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]</root>
